about_the_game:
It's summer at last! But how can it be summer without a refreshing dip in the pool? That's why our scientists at Moonstone Island Inc. have been hard at work creating our next FREE cosmetic DLC: Pool Party! Add barbecues, floaties, beach towels, and more to your summer getaway! Now, watch me cannonball. We've been practicing.

This FREE DLC includes:
  • In-Ground Pool
  • Barbecue
  • Towels
  • Beach Blanky
  • Snorcko Floatie
  • Cooler
  • Umbrella
  • Folding Chair
  • Lounge Chair
  • Bucket and Shovel
  • Tube
  • Tiki Torch
